title: Kerry Katona promotes bizarre sponsored ad with irrelevant naked photo
text:
Kerry Katona posts naked photo of herself (Picture: Instagram/REX)

Kerry Katona has posted a completely naked photo of herself on Instagram while promoting an unrelated sponsored ad for her friend’s trading company.

It’s a choice.

The 39-year-old former pop star took to Instagram on Friday evening to upload the photo (twice) of herself posing stark naked with her long curly hair covering her body.

In the photo, Kerry is in a full face of makeup and holding a wine glass filled with what appeared to be water while smiling towards the camera.

The caption reads, complete with a spelling mistake: ‘Go drop my friend… a message if you are looking to make that extra bit cash on the side! We all want that second income from you (sic) mobile.’

She also turned the comments off so people couldn’t call out her ad like they did when she recently plugged a (fan-labelled ‘dangerous’) cosmetic surgery package.

Kerry Katona posts naked photo of herself on Instagram… twice (Picture: @kerrykatona7 / Instagram)

Kerry Katona recently made headlines when she sided with Piers Morgan and mocked Sam Smith’s non-binary identity.

Advertisement

Advertisement

In September Sam confirmed that they would now be using ‘they’ and ‘them’ pronouns to describe their gender non-binary identity.

The 27-year-old singer posted a photo with the words ‘my pronouns are they/them’ but in response, Kerry has now shared her own views, writing: ‘In a debate about gender identity, Piers cheekily said he how identities as a penguin. I get what he’s saying.’

She went on: ‘Look at Sam Smith who has come out as non-binary. Piers blames Sam for the Brits axing its male/female categories.’

‘Listen, I love Sam but biologically the singer’s a male. There’s still a penis there! It’s science!’ she added.

description: Kerry Katona bizarrely promotes sponsored ad with completely irrelevant naked photo
